Name: Hungry Wolf
About the game: Hungry Wolf is a horror game. In it you need to shoot at enemies with a slingshot. They will appear in different places of the rooms. Toys and scary wolf eyes, shoot them so you don't get caught. You need to survive 60 seconds and 3 nights. Good luck! * Cool graphic * Good music
